transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Hello.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji sir, Vinith ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Uh, hello. Aap se baat kar raha hu mam?
Customer: Uh, sir, mai Lucknow se baat kar rahi hu, Sheetal Rajput.
Executive: Ji mam boliye.
Customer: Uh, ya sir, sir kuch response nahi hai. Maine jo subscription abhi liya hai, live ho gayi catalog, koi call nahi aaya.
Executive: Kaunsi, kaunsi company se baat kar rahe hai mam aap?
Customer: Global Mart.
Executive: Global Mart se baat kar rahe hai. Okay, okay. To mam ye maine meri baat kal hi sir Ujjwal ji se hui thi. Mam abhi do din hue hai mam aapka catalog live hue. Uh, sorry 15 din hue hai abhi. Nahi, uh, ha sir, 19 ko hua tha, do din hue hai mam abhi live hue aapka profile.
Customer: Okay. Uh, to kab tak matlab mere se contact kiya jayega mam is par?
Executive: Ye aapke account manager mam Vineet karke hai, Vineet Bhatti. Aap unka number le lijiye.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: 7065
Customer: Kya bole? Fir se boliye.
Executive: 7065
Customer: Ek minute sir.
Executive: 7065, 9696 pe call aa gaya tha.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Aapne abhi customer care number pe call kar diya tha mam.
Customer: Ha, to mere ko wahi number mila. Maine us pe message kiya to udhar se. Mam kal Ujjwal ji se meri baat hui hai pura proper discussion.
Customer: Sir maine bola ye complaint number hota hai mam dobara se complaint open ho gaya mam ye.
Executive: Agar aise mam daily daily aap 9696 pe call karke baat karenge, call to mere paas hi hai Vineet ke paas hi aana hai mam fir se. Ye mam problem hota hai aapke account manager se. Ye complaint unke against me raise hoti hai har baar.
Customer: To wo aapko help karenge mam agar aap roj daily basis pe unke against hi complaint dalenge aap, to help karenge mam wo aapko?
Executive: Nahi. Aur do din mam aapka catalog live kiye hue mam, do din aapka catalog live hue hai mam aapko mam result chahiye do din me.
Customer: Is tarike se mam agar aapka galat expectation setting mujhe lag raha hai mam aapka expectation jo hai IndiaMART se bahut jyada high hai jinhone bhi aapko sale kiya hai aapko shayad bataya nahi mam ye hamara digital marketing platform hai jaha pe hum aapki company ki marketing karte hai business ki koi guarantee nahi hai mam IndiaMART pe. Jo customer aapka jo service aap deal karte ho waha pe customer ka requirement hoga aap se connect karega aap convince karenge customer ko. Aur ye daily daily mam explain nahi karta hu.
Customer: Ji mam boliye.
Executive: Pehle baat, pehle baat ko sun lo bhai. Tab aap bolte rehna sir mujhe koi problem nahi hai. Baat hoti hai apni baato ki wait ki. Aap kya bol rahe ho uski wait hoti hai. Maante apni baato ki wait hai. Aur mai kisi ki kehne se mujhe nahi matlab hai. Mujhe matlab hai ki aapne jo bola us baat pe raho, thik hai? Sir ne bola do din ho jayega, do din baad aapke paas call jayega. Ek bhi call nahi. Maine bas yahi puchne ke liye. Call kyu nahi aaya mam kal meri baat hui hai mam sir se. Kyu nahi aaya call aapko kal Vineet ki baat hui hai uske baad?
Executive: 7 baje tak, 7:15 baje tak Vineet ki baat hui hai aap.
Customer: IndiaMART pe jo dala, sir IndiaMART pe jo number dala hai usse to koi contact nahi lag gaya. Mai ye baat bol rahi hu. Mujhe nahi pata tha Ujjwal sir se baat hui mai abhi contact kar le rahi hu unko.
Executive: Thik hai sir aur jo bhi. Mam aapne abhi login kiya hua hai na? Aapne login kiya, aapne login kiya hoga na abhi Global Mart ko apne mobile application se ya system se kahi se to login kiya hoga mam aapne?
Customer: Ha, system pe kiye hai sir, bataiye.
Executive: Hai na? Waha pe dekhiye account manager ka number show karta hai, image show karta hai, pura detail show karta hai account manager ka.
Customer: Kaha pe sir, bataiye?
Executive: Profile pe jaiye aap dekhiye.
Customer: Ha. Uh, dashboard pe mam. First option, first option dekhiye dashboard ka option aa raha hoga dekhiye upar.
Customer: Ha, ha, open kiye hai.
Executive: Hai na? Isko thoda scroll down karenge niche dekhiye aapke account manager ka detail aa raha hoga pura.
Customer: Account manager ya lead manager?
Executive: Mam, account manager jo hote hai aapke matlab basically jo IndiaMART se person jo aapko help karenge na, guide karenge kuch problem issue hota hai aapko call karna hai unko, unko bol raha hu account manager mam. Wo Vineet hai aapka account manager.
Customer: Sir yaha kisi ki profile banegi, ek profile dikha rahi hai but number nahi dikha rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi dashboard dekhiye mam first option dashboard dekhiye. First option hoga pehle.
Customer: Ha dashboard open kiye hu mai bataiye kaha pe hoga. Diya hua hai na mam. Is number pe jab bhi aap call karenge wo receive karenge.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART pe baat kiye, meri duty nahi hai. Kisi ne guide nahi kiya na mujhe aur first of all ye jaise jo mam se last time baat hui hai unhone bola mam aapko call jayega to mujhe thik hai. To sir dekhiye mere paas kisi ka number nahi tha isliye mai usi number pe message dali hu. Call to unhi ko jayega na jinka number yaha pe aap Ujjwal ji ka number yaha pe hai mam registered 624 se.
Customer: 62 Ujjwal ji ko hamari last 62 se start hai last me 624 hai mam.
Customer: Nahi nahi ye mere paas hai is number pe. Ha sir wo number mere paas hi hai to mere pe thodi call aayi hai. Ujjwal ji apne personal number se baat kiye wo baat alag hai. Mai unse baat kar le rahi hu.
Executive: Achha Ujjwal ji ka last me 046 hai 96 se start hai number.
Customer: Ha 46 se last me.
Executive: Okay achha Ujjwal ji ko isliye call ja rahi thi kyuki unhone bhi parso mam call kar diya tha. Parso call kiya tha unhone bhi ki wo unke paas mails wagera ja rahi thi IndiaMART ki to wo janna chah rahe the ki kya mails ja rahi hai kaise aa rahi hai kyu aa rahi hai to unko bhi kal clear karwaya tha.
Customer: Ha matlab thoda jaise jis cheez ke liye baat hui thi dekhiye sir first of all dekhiye koi bhi marketing me sales person ho to wo chahta hai ki uska closing ho jaye. Ye baat hum logo ko thik hai pata hai hum bhi jante hai hum developer hai har cheez me mujhe knowledge hai.
Executive: Bilkul mam mai samajh raha hu lekin aap ye mam dekhiye aapko bata deta hu basically IndiaMART pe kya hai jab log jab aap log ya aapke jaise Ujjwal ji ho gaye aap ho gaye jab bhi aap 9696 pe call karoge to wo ek complaint raise ho jata hai mam. Wo complaint samajhte ho mam IndiaMART pe kya hota hai complaint ko ab aap jaise aapne to man lijiye galti se kar liya hai na aap to mujhe call pe bol rahe ho ki mera chalo mere paas account manager ka number nahi tha isliye call ho gaya. Ab ye repeat ho gaya mam aapka complaint matlab kal maine close kiya hai aur aaj fir se ab company kya consider karegi ki aap customer ka problem solve hi nahi kar pa rahe ho aap dono milke.
Customer: Ha mai samajh rahi hu samajh rahi hu mai aap bole to fir uske liye mai sorry message kar du.
Executive: Nahi nahi ab us pe maine kal bhi Ujjwal ji ko bhi bataya tha ki aapko kuch bhi problem WhatsApp bhi unko save karwaya tha. Unko WhatsApp bhi number save karwaya tha maine Vineet ka.
Customer: Achha aap koi nahi aap number note kijiye mam aap number aap aap aap number note kijiye mam ek baar Vineet ka number aap pehle save kariye. Mai bol deta hu aapko. Dikh raha hai dikh raha hai 8048 karke hai na wo dikha raha hai. Wo call karenge wo system ke through jayega mam unko call thik hai? Aap directly bhi call karenge to bhi unhi ko jayega aap direct number bhi likh lijiye unka WhatsApp wala aur direct number jo hai.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: 7065
Customer: Uh, sir wahi number 7065
Executive: 71
Customer: 71
Executive: 1749
Customer: Sir baat hai na jo matlab 17 ki nahi hai na?
Executive: Ha dobara repeat kar deta hu mai 7065
Customer: Ha.
Executive: 7117
Customer: 49. Ji.
Executive: Okay. Ye WhatsApp ka bhi number hai unka ye personal number bhi unka hai aur jo aapko number dikha raha hai us pe call karenge to bhi call unhi ko Vineet ko hi connect hoga us number se bhi. Okay, okay, sorry uske liye lekin aap. Thik hai aur mam ha abhi abhi Vineet aaj actually thoda sa tabiyat thik nahi tha to aaj late aayega Vineet isliye mere se connect ho gaya aapka call directly. Mai unka manager baat kar raha hu. But abhi se matlab jaise aap open karenge na isko Global Mart ke catalog ko. To Vineet aapko pura demo ha demo demo karega Vineet pura unko bhi ek assign hoga jaise ki aapka jaise do din hi hue abhi live hue shayad aaj ya kal me demo assign ho jayega unko karne ke liye aapke sath me. To ha wo pura guide karega aapko screen share karke na pura guide karega aapko har option batayega wo. Sir baat ye hai na mai ye bol rahi hu na sir dekhiye meri baat suniyega dekhiye hum log hum log company four years se chala rahe hai to hame aaj tak kisi bhi business ko lane ke liye hame kisi platform ki jarurat nahi hui sir thik hai. Ye to mai apne dosto ke kehne pe channel le li matlab bahut achchi response hai IndiaMART se batai ho Founder Code company hai Lucknow me. To humne bataya thik hai achchi baat hai mai le le rahi hu. To sir dekhiye agar yaha koi agar paisa lagata hai na to usse output rakhta hi achchi aaye response. Thik hai? Aur jinhone jo bhi humne dosto ko hataiye jinse humne purchase kiya un pe maine bahut bharosa kar diya to mai ye complaint nahi dal rahi hu thik hai. Mujhe pata hai ki IndiaMART bahut achcha platform hai ek logo ne bahut log bole tabhi to mai sir purchase ki hu. Mai bhi. Nahi nahi mam aisa bhi baat nahi hai dekhiye mai mai samajh raha hu aap logo ka aapko lag raha hai na ki agar nahi man lijiye aapne use kiya services aapko kahi bhi lagta hai ki nahi ho pa raha hai nahi ho pa raha hai ya matlab nahi kar payenge hum IndiaMART ke through ya customer hamara us tarike se response nahi de raha jo hamara expectation tha to aap kabhi bhi Vineet ko within 30 days within 30 days aap Vineet ko bol dijiyega ki nahi hum nahi kar pa rahe yaha se ya hamara customer us tarike ka nahi mil raha hame jis tarike ka hame chahiye to utna jitna 15 days use 20 days use kiya 25 days use kiya 28 days use kiya uska payment cut karke aapko pura baki ka paisa refund bhi ho jayega aisa nahi hai mam company ki paisa le liya ab to bas gaya aapka paisa aisa nahi hai mam. Sir isliye sir market me na kuch expectation hoti hai to matter paisa nahi karta sir jab mai aapko abhi kya batai ki sir mante hai aap kar rahe honge aapni aawaz se jante honge ki hum log Aapki voice mam bahut hi break ho ke aa rahi hai mere ko na bahut hi slow aa rahi hai aapki voice break ho ho ke. Ab aa rahi hai? Ab aa rahi hai? Sir actually mai ye bata rahi hu ki jaise hum log company abhi four years se chala rahe hai thik hai hamari ek aur company chalti hai. Sir hamara software pe hi kaam hai aur second part hamara training center chalta hai. Ji, ji. Thik hai sir. To hamare yaha mai bata rahi hu hamara bhi on campus training Lucknow me chal rahi hai BBD college me thik hai multiple bacho ko job lagana sir aur job laga ke paisa nahi direct khud sikha ke police me developer bana ke digital marketer bana ke SEO executive bana ke proper MNC company me job lagana. Ji. Knowledge hai tabhi to sir gain ho raha hai but lekin thoda ek hota hai na ki nahi chalo agar Lucknow me hum to top pe hum chale bas iske liye maine IndiaMART ko purchase kiya. Ki hum nahi nahi mam aisa nahi ki matlab nahi hota yaha pe bahut sari companies dekhenge mam bahut time se kar rahe hai aur kafi achcha response aa raha hai tabhi continue bhi kar rahe hai wo. To ye hai lekin ye sab platforms me mam sirf platforms me samay lagta hai kyuki aapka just abhi register hua hai aur kuch log kafi samay se kar rahe honge customer ke paas unka direct number bhi hoga kabhi baat hui hogi aap ek company ek company hai Founder Code bahut achchi uski response hai Lucknow me. Matlab wo abhi young CEO hai aur mai bata rahi hu meri dost waha entry ki thi six employee the aaj ki date me waha pe 60 se 70 employee hai. Hmm hmm. Kya company ka kya name bataya mam aapne? Founder Code. Aur kya kis isme deal karte hai mam kis services me? Wo log wo log deal karte hai wahi IndiaMART pe hi unki platform hai star packages hai unki. Nahi nahi nahi nahi service kya dete hai mam service kya dete hai wo? Software ki hai. Achha software wagera services dete hai thik thik thik. Aur star supplier use kar rahe hai fir to mam obviously unko to aa raha hoga achcha khasa response agar star supplier use kar rahe hai to. Ha unhone ROI nikal ke star packages se. Hmm hmm. Baki aur aapne aur aapka pan India aapka pan India hai aapko matlab local local ke liye aapne karwaya mam isko? Nahi nahi pan India hai. Mam ek minute rukiye mai cut karke aapko laga raha hu apne direct number se mam voice bahut break ho raha hai mam isme. Okay okay. Aapka number aapka number ye yahi aa raha hai na yaha pe jo last me 624 hai mam? Ha ha ye mera personal number hai. Mai laga raha hu mam aapko call kar raha hu mai direct. Okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- No response after taking subscription.

- Catalog is live, but no calls received.

- Wants to know when she will be contacted.



Resolution:

- Executive provided account manager's number.

- Explained the digital marketing platform of IndiaMART.

- Explained the refund policy if not satisfied.

- Executive will call back from direct number due to voice issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back from direct number.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, refund, account manager
